english.segment1: I wanna tell you. I wanna tell you just how I feel. I will show you. I will show you my love is real
english.segment2: Nobody's ever gonna love you like I am. You never can deny that. Nobody's ever gonna hold you like I am. I'll love you til I die. Until the day I die
english.segment3: I said forever. I said forever and I mean it. I made a promise. And I intend to always keep it
english.segment4: Forever is so far beyond the reach of my mind. So I'll give all I have, my heart, my love, my life
